<p style="text-align: justify;">

Greetings all! I'm Saheb Gabadia, presently advancing towards a Master of Science in Information Management at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I am interning as a Software Developer and anticipate my graduation in May 2024.

</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">

Amidst the academic rigor, I've embraced basketball and volleyball as my recreational pursuits. Every weekend, my friends and I conscientiously carve out time to engage in these sports, which serve as a delightful respite from the bustling array of work and assignments that fill our weeks.

</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">

In this blog, I will embark on an analytical journey through two distinct datasets, meticulously examining each to uncover hidden insights and patterns. Through a series of thoughtfully crafted visualizations, I aim to bring to light the intricate details and overarching trends embedded within the data. My objective is to provide a comprehensive and enlightening analysis that not only informs but also captivates the reader's interest, leveraging the power of data visualization to transform complex information into accessible and compelling narratives.

</p>
